mapper.insert: INSERT INTO survey (surveyno, survey_title, seqno, qa_num, qa_contents, start_date, fin_date, write_date, adminno, memberno) VALUES(survey_seq.nextval, #{survey_title}, #{seqno}, #{qa_num}, #{qa_contents}, #{start_date}, #{fin_date}, sysdate, #{adminno}, #{memberno})
mapper.select: SELECT surveyno, survey_title, seqno, qa_num, qa_contents, start_date, fin_date, write_date, adminno, memberno FROM survey ORDER BY surveyno ASC
